DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to capture the result of background tissue standard uptake value (SUV) activity. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Existing conditions, especially those that would be confused with the phenomenon to be observed or measured._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) 1[injected dose (nCi) 1 body weight (g)]._Named locations of or within the body._The result of an action._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Existing conditions, especially those that would be confused with the phenomenon to be observed or measured.:An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.

Concepts.definition: Existing conditions, especially those that would be confused with the phenomenon to be observed or measured.
An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.

Property.preferredDefinition: An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) 1[injected dose (nCi) 1 body weight (g)].:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) / [injected dose (nCi) / body weight (g)].
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent a standardized uptake ratio value generated during a positron emission tomography scan.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support U Washington adoption of C3D for FES trial.
